thread.title: Pictures show Kylie Minogue's ex-fiance in clinch with another woman weeks after engagement to singer
thread.title_full: Pictures show Kylie Minogue's ex-fiance in clinch with another woman weeks after engagement to singer

author: Halina Watts
title: Pictures show Kylie Minogue's ex-fiance in clinch with another woman weeks after engagement to singer
text:
Joshua Sasse enjoying an afternoon out with an unidentified female friend last March following his engagement to Kylie Minogue Share Get daily updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Kylie Minogue ’s fiance throws his arms around another woman just weeks after he and the Aussie singer had got engaged. 
Joshua Sasse had professed his love for Kylie and the smitten pop star was convinced she had finally found Mr Right. 
But these exclusive pictures will be a fresh blow to the singer, who announced her split from Joshua just days ago. 
The break-up came amid claims actor Joshua, 29, had become close to a Spanish co-star while filming a romantic comedy. Joshua Sasse is seen enjoying an afternoon out with an unidentified female friend Joshua and the female friend appeared to be close The pair shared a hug after their pub visit Joshua was seen with the pretty brunette last March 
The pictures of him in a clinch with another woman raise further suspicions. 
We can reveal Joshua enjoyed a three-hour lunch in a pub with the pretty brunette. 
One onlooker said of the West London rendezvous: “They seemed very happy in each other’s company. You could tell they were close and had a lot in common. 
“They were laughing a lot. If you didn’t know Joshua was with Kylie you might have thought they were a couple.” Onlookers felt they looked like a couple 
By the time they left it was dark and the woman followed Joshua to his motorbike before heading off into the night. 
The onlooker added: “The lady gave Joshua an embrace and they seemed close. They were clearly very fond of each other.” 
It is not known if Kylie, 48, knew about Joshua’s friendship with the woman. But a source claims her increasing suspicions about his loyalty led to the end of their 18-month romance. It is not known if Kylie, 48, knew about Joshua’s friendship with the woman 
The source believes the singer felt she could “no longer trust” Joshua after he had grown close to his TV co-star Marta Milans, 34. 
It has been suggested they bonded in Vancouver, Canada, while filming the rom com No Tomorrow. 
Kylie confirmed the split on Instagram with an emotive image of a sunrise over calm waters. 
Using the hashtag #thesunalwaysrises, she captioned the picture: “We wish only the best for each other as we venture towards new horizons.” Witnesses said they seemed fond of each other 
She did not comment on the rumours about Joshua and Marta. 
Joshua, who shared a pad with Kylie in West London, has been staying in Herefordshire with his parents and dec-lined to talk. Sister Lydia, a yoga inst-ructor, also had no comment. 
Joshua swept Kylie off her feet when they met in summer 2015 on the set of TV musical comedy Galavant. 
They got engaged last February and there were rumours they had secretly wed in the summer. But in October they announced they would not marry until gay marriage was made legal in Australia. 
Joshua had gushed about Kylie during an interview in August. He said: “I know I’m in love when I don’t want to be anywhere else but with her. 
“As anyone who has met her will attest, she is the most unbelievable bundle of joy. It’s magic, it’s excitement and joy and sex.” 
In a Desert Island Discs interview in December 2015, Kylie told of the possibility of having children after reportedly getting her eggs frozen before having chemotherapy for breast cancer in 2005. 
But friends of the star insist she has had a “lucky escape” from Joshua. 
Last week Kylie announced she had signed to the label BMG and is planning a “pure pop” album later this year. Kylie Minogue and Joshua Sasse in Galavant 
That will be a welcome distraction after her split – the latest heartache in a rollercoaster love life. 
In 1989 she dumped her Neighbours co-star Jason Donovan to date INXS frontman Michael Hutchence. 
But the rocker, who died in 1997, left Kylie for supermodel Helena Christensen in 1991. Kylie bounced back, dating singer Lenny Kravitz that same year. Joshua Sasse Joshua Sasse and the unidentified female friend 
She went on to have a three-year relationship with model James Gooding, a four-year liaison with French actor Olivier Martinez and a five-year romance with Spanish male model Andres Velencoso. 
After falling for Joshua, Kylie said she wanted to take his surname – though there was no sign of a wedding date, despite the engagement. Kylie said recently: “Mum isn’t buying a hat.” 
After calling time on the romance she told her supportive fans in an online post: “Thank you for all your love and support throughout this recent chapter of my life. Thank you now for your love and understanding with the news that Josh and I have decided to go our separate ways.” 
halina.watts@trinitymirror.com
